product_name: Lowa Tempest QC Hiking Boots - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and nimble with materials that are perfect for warm, dry climates, the men's Lowa Tempest QC Hiking Boots offer plenty of comfort and stability for trips on your favorite trails. Suede and nubuck leather uppers provide durable, flexible support; over-the-ankle coverage adds support on rocky trails. Synthetic linings wick moisture away from feet to increase comfort. Polyurethane midsoles and nylon shanks provide lasting comfort and support. Vibram(R) rubber outsoles on the Lowa Tempest QC Hiking Boots provide excellent traction on a variety of terrain. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and nimble with materials that are perfect for warm, dry climates, the men's Lowa Tempest QC Hiking Boots offer plenty of comfort and stability for trips on your favorite trails.
